  </Card>
  <Card title="Production-Ready Architecture" icon="server" iconType="solid">
    *Scalable* and *reliable* by design—NOMOS offers session management, error handling, monitoring, and Docker deployment. Move from prototype to production with built-in support for *Redis*, *PostgreSQL*, and distributed monitoring.
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

<CardGroup cols={3}>
